import_check.js (1692B) (raw) (blame)

      1 // Verifies that a module can be imported, and that it has a certain
      2 // version. See `npm_library` for more details.
      3 
      4 // Read --import_name= and --import_version= from args.
      5 var importName;
      6 var importVersion;
      7 var noImportMainTest = false;
      8 
      9 for (var i = 0; i < process.argv.length; i++) {
     10   var arg = process.argv[i];
     11   if (arg.startsWith('--import_name=')) {
     12     importName = arg.slice('--import_name='.length);
     13     continue;
     14   }
     15   if (arg.startsWith('--import_version=')) {
     16     importVersion = arg.slice('--import_version='.length);
     17     continue;
     18   }
     19   if (arg === '--no_import_main_test') {
     20     noImportMainTest = true;
     21     continue;
     22   }
     23 }
     24 
     25 if (!importName) {
     26   console.error("Argument `--import_name=` missing");
     27   process.exit(1);
     28 }
     29 
     30 if (!importVersion) {
     31   console.error("Argument `--import_version=` missing");
     32   process.exit(1);
     33 }
     34 
     35 // Check that the import is valid
     36 try {
     37   if (!noImportMainTest) {
     38     require(importName);
     39   }
     40 } catch (e) {
     41   console.error("Could not import module: " + importName);
     42   console.error(e);
     43   console.error(
     44     "If this module does not have a `main` js file, you should set the\n" +
     45       "attribute `no_import_main_test = True` to skip that check.\n" +
     46       "The default main is `index.js` in the root folder. Otherwise, the\n" +
     47       "main is set to the `main` key in the module's package.json.");
     48   process.exit(1);
     49 }
     50 
     51 // Read the import's version.
     52 var packageJSON = require(importName + '/package.json');
     53 
     54 if (packageJSON.version !== importVersion) {
     55   console.error("Import supplied version does not match version received: " +
     56               "Version wanted: " + importVersion + ", version received: " + packageJSON.version);
     57   process.exit(1);
     58 }
